name: The Simulation (SlushyRH)
description:
Your a newly recruited robber and in order to start your journey, you must pass the simulation with as much money as your can possibly gather in the time they have given you. Good luck!

Controls are in settings menu. I tried to upload this game as an HTML but it kept crashing so I'm sorry about that.

This was submitted for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1.
